Aisha Salaudeen (amụrụ na 26 Septemba 1994) bụ onye nta akụkọ mgbasa ozi Naijiria, onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị, onye na'emepụta ihe, na onye edemede nke na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na CNN. N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2020, e nyere ya onyinye Ọdịnihu Awards Africa Prize maka nta akụkọ maka ọrụ ya na-ekpuchi akụkọ na Africa. Ọ bụ onye ọbịa na-ekwu okwu na Ake Arts and Book Festival 2020.
Salaudeen malitere ọrụ mgbasa ozi ya na 2013 mgbe ọ wepụtara onwe ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe ngosi na Mahadum Bradfordz
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa n'afọ 2017, ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ndekọ ego ya iji chụsoo ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ.
O nwetara aha ya na Al Jazeera na Oge ego.
Ọ sonyeere Azụmahịa Stears dị ka onye nta akụkọ na 2018.
Ọrụ mbụ Salaudeen na Stears bụ na azụmahịa na ọdịbendị
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2018, o dere akụkọ nyocha nke akpọrọ: Ala ọma jijiji, ọrịa akpa ume, na unyi: ihe ọ na-adị ka ibi na Kurata
Akụkọ ahụ bụ maka obodo na-alụ ọgụ megide nnukwu mmetọ gburugburu ebe obibi.

N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2019, akụkọ ya nke akpọrọ: Ụmụ nwanyị na-alụbeghị di enweghị ike ịgbazite ala na Naịjirịa kpughere etu o si sie ike maka ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirị na-alụghị di ịgbazite ụlọ n'onwe ha na mba ahụ.
Ọ hapụrụ Stears n'ọnwa Eprel 2019 iji sonye na netwọk akụkọ CNN.
Aisha Salaudeen bụ onye na-emepụta ihe dijitalụ ugbu a na CNN
Akụkọ mbụ ya maka CNN bụ banyere nwa nwoke dị afọ 9 nke mepụtara ihe karịrị egwuregwu vidio 30
Kemgbe ahụ, o mepụtara akụkọ banyere mmerụ ahụ ụmụ nwanyị, enweghị nhata, ikike ite ime na ime ihe ike mmekọahụ.
Salaudeen mere YNaija 2019 New Establishment List.

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2020, Aisha Salaudeen mere British Vogue ndepụta nke 50 Trailblazing Creatives And Young Activists From Across. N'ọnwa Disemba 2020, a kpọrọ ya onye mmeri nke onyinye The Future Awards Africa maka ọrụ odeakụkọ.
